statements: SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE data_type = 'GDPR';
SELECT id, customer_name, address FROM regulatory_compliance ORDER BY date_received DESC;
SELECT customer_name, address, data_type FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE data_type = 'Category A' ORDER BY date_received DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, customer_name, address FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE date_received < '2021-01-01' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT customer_name, address, data_type FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' AND data_type = 'Category B';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE customer_name IN ('John Doe', 'Jane Smith') ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT id, customer_name, address, date_received FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE date_received BETWEEN '2020-06-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance_data;
SELECT data FROM regulatory_compliance_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, data FROM regulatory_compliance_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM audit_logs;
SELECT username, event_timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE event_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, data FROM regulatory_compliance_data ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT username, event_timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE username = 'admin' ORDER BY event_timestamp ASC
SELECT id, data FROM regulatory_compliance_data WHERE id IN (2, 4, 6)
SELECT id, data FROM regulatory_compliance_data WHERE data LIKE '%important%'
SELECT username, event_timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE event_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM compliance_data ORDER BY data_date DESC;
SELECT data_text, data_date FROM compliance_data WHERE data_id = 3;
SELECT log_text, log_date FROM compliance_logs WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY log_date ASC;
SELECT username, email FROM compliance_users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM compliance_data WHERE data_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM compliance_data ORDER BY data_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT data_text, data_date FROM compliance_data WHERE data_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY data_text;
SELECT * FROM compliance_logs WHERE log_date >= '2022-01-01' AND user_id = 1 ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM compliance_users WHERE role = 'admin' ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT log_text, log_date FROM compliance_logs JOIN compliance_users ON compliance_logs.user_id = compliance_users.user_id WHERE role = 'admin' ORDER BY log_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.total_price, p.name AS product_name FROM transactions t INNER JOIN products p ON t.product_id = p.product_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email, address FROM customers WHERE address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, total_amount, date_ordered FROM orders ORDER BY date_ordered DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price >= 50.00 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT t.transaction_id, p.name, t.quantity, t.total_price FROM transactions t JOIN products p ON t.product_id = p.product_id;
SELECT name, data_type FROM compliance_data;
SELECT * FROM security_logs ORDER BY log_time DESC;
SELECT audit_id, action, action_time FROM audit_trail WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE role_name LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT * FROM compliance_data ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT name, data_type FROM compliance_data WHERE compliance_level > 2
SELECT * FROM security_logs WHERE log_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01'
SELECT u.user_id, r.role_name FROM user_roles u JOIN roles r ON u.role_id = r.role_id
SELECT * FROM audit_trail ORDER BY action_time ASC
